activities: Earth Class Mail provides support to clients' direct mail accounts.  This support may entail receiving personal data of EU citizens from our clients to provide operational and technical support of their accounts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
If, after contacting ECM, if there is the belief that data privacy inquiry has not been resolved to satisfaction, the party can  contact the Direct Marketing Association at:
